sentences.en: And assuredly nothing would happen except what he should choose.
sentences.cn: 况且他决不会碰到他不想碰到的事.

sentences.en: As assuredly as I am in Christ, Christ is also in me.
sentences.cn: 我在基督里是如何确定,照样, 基督在我里面也是同样的确定.

sentences.en: Do all the myriad forms of gaming have anything in common? Most assuredly.
sentences.cn: 千变万化的游戏形式是否有共同点? 几乎可以这么说.

sentences.en: Given the level of scientific technology however, not every project be assuredly resolved.
sentences.cn: 由于科技发展水平等原因, 并不能保证每个项目均可得到圆满解决.

sentences.en: However, thinking about these things happened lately, I did badly assuredly.
sentences.cn: 不过把这些事前前后后想一想, 还是自己做得不好.

sentences.en: I am most assuredly in favour.
On the right hand is assuredly that'squirt'Val Dartie.
sentences.cn: 右边男的也同样肯定是那个“瘪三”法尔·达尔第.

sentences.en: Rommel's staff might worry about such things, but Rommel assuredly did not.
sentences.cn: Rommel的属下也许得为这些事操心, 但是Rommel本人并不需要.

sentences.en: Striking contract on these unfavorable terms will assuredly incur losses on you.
sentences.cn: 以如此不利的条款签约必定使您蒙受损失.

sentences.en: The grammar schools were assuredly not intended for the gentry alone.
sentences.cn: 这所语法学校明确表示不会只招贵族学生.

sentences.en: The techniques of internal management will assuredly change.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,内部的管理技术也会改变.

sentences.en: This thing have happened assuredly in my life.
sentences.cn: 这种情况在生活中确有发生。

words.tran_cn: 保证的；确信的；使人有信心的
保证；担保；使确信；弄清楚
